comprehensive_overview: PyPysam is a Python module that provides an interface to the SAM/BAM sequence alignment and variant calling format files. It allows for easy reading, writing, and manipulation of such files, enabling bioinformatics analysis and processing of high-throughput sequencing data.
core_features: 1. Reading and writing SAM/BAM files. 2. Accessing aligned sequences and associated metadata. 3. Extracting alignment statistics. 4. Handling variant calling information. 5. Performing coordinate transformations and conversions.
